name: MONOPOLY LAND
description:
The classic board-game of Monopoly  in adventure mode: Goku monkey (or the little mushroom in demo-version) explores the Monopoly land.

There are 3 levels:

the sky where you can pick  the coins

the normal way with the classic game (contracts, house, tax, ...)

the hell, where you can die!

You can press the SPACEBAR to jump (in windows version)

In Android version: you can press "arrow-up"  (to  jump) and "arrow-right" (to go fastly)
